website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch audio splitter that provides great sound quality and is built to last.
pros: Includes gold-plated connector plugs to provide consistent sound quality
Boasts RCA cables that are expertly crafted for outstanding durability
More affordable than many comparable splitters
Offers a wonderful choice for use with flat-screen TVs
cons: Connectors are very thin and flimsy
May cause a loud buzzing sound

customer_reviews.title: RCA connector is too weak to make proper contact.
customer_reviews.text: I received this promptly but ended up throwing it away .. . the RCA connectors are so thin that they deflect away from the female portion of the connector when installed. The material is so weak that you can deflect it with a slight finger push. No matter how delicately you adjust the connector to mate properly, when you install it the contacts deflect out and don't have sufficient contact to stay connected securely. There is no way I would buy this again nor recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Trenkle

customer_reviews.title: works great..
customer_reviews.text: works great....my new tv in motorhome didn't have the old style "jack" for plugging in an external speaker. this product was a cheap way to hook one up. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: I now have a better sound setup then if I used the projector speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to connect a pair of comp speakers to a movie projector. I now have a better sound setup then if I used the projector speaker alone. This splitter did the trick.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you pay for. One of the port rims was a little bent upon receipt, but I’m confident that’s a lack of packaging on either the manufacturer or shipper’s part. Easily fixed and already hard at work.

customer_reviews.title: Poor shielding, buzzing - look for a better cable!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this particular item is just too cheaply made to be of any real use. I bought this Y-splitter to connect my computer speakers, but as soon as I plugged this in, it caused my speakers to buzz. It's very likely that this cable hasn't been shielded properly. Looking through the reviews, some have had this same issue, and others have not. It seems like there isn't much quality control being performed by Mocreo; I'd recommend spending a few extra dollars for a cable from a reputable company instead.
customer_reviews.author: EHubs

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the flimsy quality of the connectors.
customer_reviews.text: The RCA connectors are really flimsy. The ground connectors of both are really thin so as result, they bend very easy. Problem is I tried these on numerous RCA connectors I have and they also fall off very easy. They will work if you don't have the connectors hanging and don't whatever you do pull the cable connected to them, the least tug and they come off. I have dozens of other RCA cables and connectors and none of them are as flimsy as these. I didn't contact the seller because BOTH cables were the same cheap quality. This wasn't just a "bad" one, they're low quality. I threw them away and ordered more from a different source. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Splitter
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product I also purchased a two way splitter so I can now use my CD player on AUX and when not using Cd player I can plug my cell phone into this and use my Home theater to play music that is on my cell phone through Home theater Sounds great 100 watts per channel is a lot nicer than a small speaker

product_meta.title: MOCREO Audio Y Cable Splitter 1-Mini Plug, 2-RCA Plugs 3.5mm Stereo to Dual RCA Audio Adapter Cable, 3.5mm Female to Dual RCA Male 6 inch
product_meta.description:
Connect your computer or audio device (iPod, MP3 Player, etc.) to a stereo receiver or multimedia speakers. Features 3.5mm, gold-plated connector plugs with standard RCA cables - The MUFMRCA 6in 3.5mm to RCA stereo audio cable features one 3.5mm (TRS) female and 2x RCA male connectors, enabling you to connect your portable audio device ( iPod or other MP3 player) to your home stereo. 

Specifications: 
0.3 ounces
1.2 x 1.2 x 1.2 inches ; 0.3 ounces
feature_bullets: Stereo 3.5mm to stereo RCA Y cable connector
2 x RCA Male / 1 x 3.5mm Stereo Female, 6 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars295 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
